multiplechoiceresponse.p: How can entries can be added to a stream?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one answer

choicegroup.choice: By appending to the end of the stream
By prepending to the front of the stream
By inserting them at a specific location in the stream
By swapping with an existing stream entry

div.p: Streams behave like an append-only log. The only way to add entries to a stream is by appending them to the end.
